name: 『LiQ』Liquid Gaming - New Player Friendly - AAS/RAAS/INV - PTFO
description: Our main Squad server: Designed for everyone, including new players looking to learn the game and improve their skills.

rules.title: 1.1 Apologize for ALL teamkills
rules.description: Apologize for ALL teamkills in [J key] ALL chat. Intentional teamkilling is bannable, including revenge TKs.

rules.title: 1.2 No Squad Baiting
rules.description: When a player clicks to create a squad, they must lead that squad. Creating squads you don't intend to lead will result in action. Lead it or disband it.

rules.title: 1.3 Squad Leaders must have microphone & SL kit
rules.description: All SLs must have an SL kit & microphone - SLs should actively lead their squad, communicate & coordinate.

rules.title: 1.4 No Locked Squads Under 4
rules.description: Unless named for a vehicle claim or TOW/Mortar FOB.

rules.title: 1.5 No Advertising in our servers
rules.description: No advertising clans, discords or similar communities within our own spaces.

rules.title: 1.6 No LiQ clan stacking on New Player Friendly
rules.description: A difference of 6 players overall is stacking (recruits included). LiQ members should take initiative to prevent stacks and balance matches themselves. Please follow yellow text, red warning & chats by our admins. LiQ members will be force swapped otherwise. Intentional LiQ stacking will result in action. Use !switch or ask for help to swap over.

rules.title: 2.1 No Hate Speech
rules.description: Hate speech, discriminatory behavior, sexual harassment, and slurs are forbidden.

rules.title: 2.2 No Toxicity
rules.description: Toxicity is not tolerated - Be respectful through your communications and actions.

rules.title: 2.3 No Politics, Play The Match!
rules.description: Political, controversial or NSFW topics are discouraged. Focus on the match!

rules.title: 2.4 No Trolling/Griefing.
rules.description: No Trolling/Griefing - Intentionally disrupting matches is not allowed.

rules.title: 2.5 Open A Ticket!
rules.description: If you have rule concerns/reports, create a ticket on our Discord with evidence. Chat is not the place to argue about rules, this can be disruptive to all players.

rules.title: 3.1 No Soloing Vehicles
rules.description: No soloing vehicles that require a crewman kit to operate - Leaving main or pushing further into battle while soloing is forbidden.

rules.title: 3.2 Claim Your Vehicle
rules.description: The squad named after AND created first has the priority in claiming the vehicle. Squads with enough players, have their name claim extend to more than one vehicle. Claim is NOT always the squad with the lowest numbered squad (for instance when a squad is disbanded and renamed). Always follow admin directions.

rules.title: 3.3 Be Specfic In Squad Names To Ensure Claim!
rules.description: Non-specific squad names like Armor will get leftovers. Squad names that refer to a single spawn like MBT, TANK, Abrams or M1A2 are equal. Names that apply to more than one vehicle will get leftovers.

rules.title: 3.4 No Heli v. Heli Ramming
rules.description: Intentional Heli v. Heli ramming is bannable - Apologize for all accidents in ALL chat.

rules.title: 4.1 No Main Camping
rules.description: No main camping - Our rule is based on intention, not distance. Setting up ambushes or placing mines intending to kill vehicles leaving the roads out of the main is not allowed. Play your active objectives! Will be considered camping the enemy main and punished under this rule at the discretion of the LiQ admin in a kick/ban.

rules.title: 4.2 Play The Objective
rules.description: Play the ACTIVE objective (PTFO) -  When in doubt play for the active flags or mid-map control. Intentionally rushing the first or second point is not allowed on RAAS. Follow admin guidance and warnings.

rules.title: No Sharing Team Info
rules.description: Do NOT share sensitive team info. This includes going AFK with map open while streaming

rules.title: Do not Exploit Game Bugs Such As a Wall Breach & Invulnerable FOBs.
rules.description: Any game bug or exploit that is created, manufactured, or accidentally found by a player and then used to hamper the opposing team's efforts to win the game. Is applicable to this rule and is met with a kick/ban where the severity of the circumstances are determined by the LiQ admin.

rules.title: No Unarmed Kits
rules.description: When the server is live, you are not allowed to have an unarmed kit.

rules.title: To report problems with a specific server, players can email licensing@offworldindustries.com with the following details:
rules.description: Name of the server, any evidence such as video, pictures, etc, date and time of the incident. Or alternatively you can fill out the following form https://forms.gle/R3D434WVuaY9obtT6

name: 『LiQ』Liquid Gaming - Teamwork Required - Map Voting - PTFO
description: This is our second server where teamwork is expected. Squad leaders must be active in Command Chat!.

name: 『LiQ』Liquid Gaming: SPOOKTOBER-FUN/Squadz/Extraction/TheLost/VIP/LastStand
description: Modded server for Halloween featuring the SquadZ mod

rules.title: HATE SPEECH Is Strictly FORBIDDEN
rules.description: Any speech that denigrates a person or group will not be tolerated; Including but not limited to race, sexual orientation, and religion. Any instances of hate speech considered to be offensive or hindering the experience of any player on a LiQuid Gaming Server will result in a ban as determined by a LiQ Admin.

rules.title: All Summoners (SLs) Must Have A MIC & Summoner KIT until death.
rules.description: Summoners must be able to effectively communicate with the team and squad using a microphone. Also the summoner must at all times have a squad leader kit until the player dies. Severity of circumstances for punishment will be determined by the LiQ admin of the server at that time.

rules.title: If you CREATE a squad you must be the Summoner of that squad until death.
rules.description: When a player clicks to create a squad then they must lead that squad until the player dies. A warn/kick method is in place for this rule and is up to the discretion of the LiQ admin to determine the severity of the circumstances.

rules.title: DO NOT Exploit GAME BUGS
rules.description: Any game bug or exploit that is created, manufactured, or accidently found by a player and then used to hamper the opposing team's efforts to win the game. This includes going outside the map. Is applicable to this rule and is met with a kick/ban where the severity of the circumstances are determined by the LiQ admin.

rules.title: Players That Are NOT Assigned To a SQUAD Will Be KICKED From The Server.
rules.description: Any player that does not immediately join or create a squad when they join the server is subject to a kick from the server under the presumption that they are either AFK or wishing to play unassigned. Generally resulting in a kick but circumstances will be handled by a LiQ admin.

rules.title: DON'T BE AN ASSHAT or TROLL.
rules.description: Under this rule any player found to be intentionally disrupting the flow of gameplay or other player’s experience in the server. Outside of normal gameplay and discussion. Will be met with a warn/kick/ban under the discretion of the LiQ admin.

rules.title: Intentional Teamkilling will not be tolerated.
rules.description: Apologize for all teamkills in all chat.

rules.title: No Self Promoting
rules.description: Streamers are welcome to play on our servers. But spamming chat with promotions and/or advertising will not be promoted any form. If you wish to promote on our servers please contact our administration on our discord.

rules.title: Politics
rules.description: Do not discuss or reference politics or other controversial topics on the server

rules.title: Sharing team info
rules.description: Do NOT share sensitive team info. This includes going AFK with map open while streaming

rules.title: To report problems with a specific server, players can email licensing@offworldindustries.com with the following details:
rules.description: Name of the server, any evidence such as video, pictures, etc, date and time of the incident. Or alternatively you can fill out the following form https://forms.gle/R3D434WVuaY9obtT6
